original_text: And Jesus stretched out his hand and touched him, saying, “I will; be clean.” And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.
korean_text: 예수께서 손을 내밀어 그에게 대시며 이르시되 내가 원하노니 깨끗함을 받으라 하시니 즉시 그의 나병이 깨끗하여진지라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus stretched out his hand
And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 즉시 그의 나병이 깨끗하게 되었습니다.
